name: NETDISK-CLOUD
tagline: PHP scripts to manage NETDISKs and provide access as a cloud storage location.
body:
## Welcome to the NETDISK-CLOUD Project!
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages that tells all about the NETDISK-CLOUD project. 

###Nice features in the works
It's rather minimal, but we hope it will bring access to the NDAS Drives by any of the bigger and better cloud platforms. For now, there is a minimal file server in the code. 

### Admin Section
![Admin Section](http://www.iocellnetworks.com/netdisk-cloud/images/admin.section.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
